comments.body: This part is a duplicate of code that @eparis is refactoring in PR #1191. If you introduce it here then we'll have this in two separate places. Can we have that one completed first and then reuse those functions here instead?

I'd rather not wait.  I'm happy to merge these in after he is done.  I'll have to tweak things to handle the cross compiling and the ability to pass the version flags in (as this isn't a git directory we are populating the ld flags into the build container into `/kube-version-defs`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@function kube::build::make_binaries() {
  if [[ ${#targets[@]} -eq 0 ]]; then
    targets=(
      cmd/proxy
      cmd/apiserver
